title: [Yaakov Kraftmakher]Experiments and Demonstrations in Physics Ba
description:
A laboratory manual for high schools, colleges, and universities. The second edition contains more than 140 experiments and demonstrations presented in ten chapters: Introductory Experiments (30), Mechanics (11), Molecular Physics (11), Electricity and Magnetism (13), Optics and Atomic Physics (12), Condensed Matter Physics (11), Semiconductors (10), Applied Physics (11), Nobel Prize Experiments (10), and Student Projects (25). All the experiments are illustrated through the results of real measurements. New experiments developed by the author in 2007Ã¢â‚¬â€œ2014 are added to this edition.
Readership: High school students, teachers, university instructors, and academics in general physics.

Publisher: World Scientific Publishing Company; 2 edition (November 30, 2014)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 9814434884
ISBN-13: 978-9814434881
